name: Love Letters I Never Sent
description:
"Love Letters I Never Sent" is a raw and painfully honest diary that captures moments of unimagined bliss, pure hell, and the reconstruction of the heart and soul during and after love. As of now, it is only intended for an online release. The "Shipping & Handling Charge" is tax.

PDF format. strong language. recommended for ages 16 & up

name: Letters from the Editor
description:
The debut narrative poetic novella "Letters from the Editor." A collection of written spoken word, forming a story based in empowerment. It is a journey of failure, self-revelation, and triumph. Using metaphors, vivid descriptions, and raw emotions, “Letters” serves as an intense observation of the issues that affect us all.

recommended for ages 16 & up

  • preview the book: here
  • format: softcover | 120 pages
  • ISBN: 978-0-615-36057-7
  • shipping is currently limited within the United States
